channel.title: Can you invoke two services in one action?
channel.description:
Hi,
What I do a quick capture, I want to upload it into a dropbox folder, and then send a task to todoist that reminds me to check the folder. I don't necessarily need to link back to the file in dropbox, but I would like to have a reminder to check.
Can this be done? I'm a novice to Drafts, but wondering if this has been done before
